com.avos.avoscloud

类 AVRole

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avos.avoscloud.AVObject
      • com.avos.avoscloud.AVRole

  • public final class AVRole
extends AVObject

    Represents a Role on the AVOSCloud server. AVRoles represent groupings of AVUsers for the purposes of granting permissions (e.g. specifying a AVACL for a AVObject). Roles are specified by their sets of child users and child roles, all of which are granted any permissions that the parent role has.

    Roles must have a name (which cannot be changed after creation of the role), and must specify an ACL.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AVRole

        public AVRole()

      • AVRole

        public AVRole(java.lang.String name)
        Constructs a new AVRole with the given name. If no default ACL has been specified, you must provide an ACL for the role.
        参数:
        name - The name of the Role to create.

      • AVRole

        public AVRole(java.lang.String name,
              AVACL acl)
        Constructs a new AVRole with the given name.
        参数:
        name - The name of the Role to create.
        acl - The ACL for this role. Roles must have an ACL.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the role.
        返回:
        the name of the role.

      • getQuery

        public static AVQuery<AVRole> getQuery()
        Gets a AVQuery over the Role collection.
        返回:
        A new query over the Role collection.

      • getRoles

        public AVRelation getRoles()
        Gets the AVRelation for the AVRoles that are direct children of this role. These roles' users are granted any privileges that this role has been granted (e.g. read or write access through ACLs). You can add or remove child roles from this role through this relation.
        返回:
        the relation for the roles belonging to this role.

      • getUsers

        public AVRelation getUsers()
        Gets the AVRelation for the AVUsers that are direct children of this role. These users are granted any privileges that this role has been granted (e.g. read or write access through ACLs). You can add or remove users from the role through this relation.
        返回:
        the relation for the users belonging to this role.

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.Object value)
        Add a key-value pair to this object. It is recommended to name keys in partialCamelCaseLikeThis.
        覆盖:
        put 在类中 AVObject
        参数:
        key - Keys must be alphanumerical plus underscore, and start with a letter.
        value - Values may be numerical, String, JSONObject, JSONArray, JSONObject.NULL, or other AVObjects.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)

        Sets the name for a role. This value must be set before the role has been saved to the server, and cannot be set once the role has been saved.

        A role's name can only contain alphanumeric characters, _, -, and spaces.

        参数:
        name - The name of the role.
